page.title: 07VILLAGE RECREATIONS
page.content: The{cricket ground}in Vicarage lane is the site of matches played against neighbouring clubs during the season. The{childrens playground}at the Village Hall has{swings,}a{see-saw}and {concrete pipe. Ball games}can also be enjoyed. The{Womens Institute}meets monthly and has a{keep-fit}class in winter. Senior Citizens have{Good Companions Club{meetings}and{outings.}The{Gard_ eners Club enjoy{speakers}and{visits. The{Youth Club}meets weekly. The{Ravens}and{Plough & Harrow Pubs serve bar snacks and set meals.There are{pin tables, bar billiards, darts, and at the Ravens a{skittle alley. { Individual Hobbies}include; spinning, beekeeping, gardening, bird- watching and photography, walking, woodwork, painting, needlework, tele- vision and radio.
